mappings.Response: =string.concat("Channel created: ",$activity[create].output.channel.id," Message posted: ",$activity[postMsg].output.message.text," Message Deleted: ",string.tostring($activity[delMsg].output.ok)," Conv created: ",$activity[createConv].output.channel.id," Is conv private?: ",string.tostring($activity[infoConv].output.channel.is_private)," Channel archived:",string.tostring($activity[archiveChannel].output.ok))
